column1: Male patient, 38 years old, transported since 118 with fever and cough for 5 days, treated with zitromax and tachipirine without benefit. Pathological history and remote and forthcoming mutation, in particular negative due to contact with positive Covid-19 patients.
Normal oxygen saturation; leukopenia (especially lymphopenia), polymerase chain reaction at the upper limits; remaining laboratory tests in the norm.
computed/computerized tomography scan of the chest is performed without intravenous administration of contrast medium.
Axial images, Lung algorithm reconstruction, medium scan .
Multiple pseudo-nodular densities of para-centimetric dimensions and distributed in the peri-bronco-vasal site.
